title: Back by Popular Demand: Hawaii Beachcomber by Outrigger Escape Overlooking Waikiki Beach with Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Steps from one of the world's most famous shorelines, you'll find Hawaii's first and only craft hotel: Waikiki Beachcomber by Outrigger, a tropical haven in an unbeatable location, a short walk from Waikiki Beach. Brought to you by the iconic Outrigger Hotels & Resorts, curated by local artists and reflecting Hawaii's unique natural landscapes and rich culture, Waikiki Beachcomber by Outrigger is an iconic destination set right on Kalakaua Avenue - Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment precinct. Embrace the laidback Hawaiian lifestyle as you explore the very best the island has on offer from this ultra-cool launchpad.

When you’ve had your fill of exploring, be sure to take advantage of the hotel's amenities, including a glorious pool and fully equipped fitness centre. You'll also find two dining venues onsite: Maui Brewing Co. - an incredible craft brewery and bar, offering locally brewed beers, artisan cocktails and island cuisine - and Hawaiian Aroma Caffé, Waikiki’s most Instagrammable coffee shop, with delicious locally grown Kona coffee and açaí bowls.
offer_address: 2300 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HI 96815, United States

title: Five-Star Beachfront Resort Stay Near Waikiki with Buffet Breakfast
description: Experience the unrivalled luxury of The Kahala Hotel & Resort, offering the tranquil exclusivity and five-star facilities of a sprawling beachfront resort while only being a 15-minute drive from Waikiki. An oceanfront hideaway for the rich and famous, The Kahala has played host to Hollywood stars including Angelina Jolie and Marlon Brando, plus every US President since Lyndon B. Johnson. It also boasts an impressive list of awards and was named Hawaii’s Best at the People’s Choice Awards 2019. Join this prestigious list of guests with a stay that includes daily buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner for two, daily scheduled resort transfers to Waikiki and more. Plus, up to two children (aged five years and under) stay free with breakfast included.
offer_address: 5000 Kahala Ave, Honolulu, HI 96816, United States

title: Award-Winning Hawaii Bliss near Waikiki Beach with Daily Breakfast & Two Children Stay Free
description:
Experience the pinnacle of Hawaiian luxury at this five-star sanctuary nestled in Honolulu’s prestigious Kahala district. This beachfront retreat is enveloped by lush tropical gardens, a private lagoon home to resident dolphins and the shimmering waters of the Pacific Ocean.

A secluded haven for the world’s elite, The Kahala has welcomed an illustrious guest list since its debut in the 1960s, hosting icons such as Frank Sinatra, Sir Elton John and even Queen Elizabeth II.

Savour exquisite seafood at Hoku’s Restaurant, indulge in a traditional Hawaiian lomi lomi massage at the award-winning Kahala Spa or set out to discover O‘ahu’s breathtaking natural beauty.

Hike to the summit of Diamond Head for panoramic coastal vistas, marvel at legendary surf breaks on the North Shore or explore Waikiki’s world-class shopping and dining - all just a short drive away.
offer_address: 5,000 Kahala Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96816, United States

title: Grand Opening: Experience Hawaii's Hottest New Hotel in the Heart of Waikiki Beach
description: Steps from the stunning Waikiki beach, experience the grand opening of Waikiki Beachcomber by Outrigger - a modern haven set in an unbeatable location just meters away from the iconic Waikiki Beach. Soak up the energy of Kalakaua Avenue - Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment precinct, and embrace the Hawaiian lifestyle as you enjoy daily breakfast, a beer flight with a choice of four 4oz pours (adults aged 21 years and over only) at the renowned Maui Brewing Co, and all the benefits of the exclusive Waikiki Connection - explore Waikiki with unlimited rides on the Waikiki Connection trolley, enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi connection for up to four devices, plus receive a chic tote bag to take home with you and complimentary parking. Bring the family along: one child aged 15 years and under stays for free with breakfast included.

title: Our Best Ever Hawaii Beachside Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Steps from one of the world's most famous shorelines, you'll find Hawaii's first and only craft hotel: Waikiki Beachcomber by Outrigger, a beachside haven in an unbeatable location, just metres from Waikiki Beach. Brought to you by the iconic Outrigger Hotels & Resorts, curated by local artists and reflecting Hawaii's unique natural landscapes and rich culture, Waikiki Beachcomber is an iconic destination set right on Kalakaua Avenue - Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment precinct. Embrace the laidback Hawaiian lifestyle as you explore the very best the island has on offer from this ultra-cool launchpad.

vendor_name: OUTRIGGER Waikīkī Paradise Hotel (formerly OHANA Waikiki East)
title: Hawaii Modern Waikiki Escape near Kalakaua Avenue with Daily Breakfast
description:
Step into the heart of Waikiki and discover this revamped island haven, just steps from the world-renowned Waikiki Beach and iconic International Market Place. 

Known for its pristine white-sand beaches, stunning views of Diamond Head and lively nightlife, you’ll be immersed in the vibrant pulse of the city - a bucket-list destination that effortlessly blends natural beauty with bustling urban fun.

Indulge your senses by dining at one of the hotel’s onsite eateries. At Appetito Craft Pizza & Wine Bar, savour handcrafted Neapolitan-style pizzas paired with a selection of boutique wines. For a change of pace, head to Tanaka of Tokyo, where skilled teppanyaki chefs prepare a sizzling feast of Japanese steak and seafood right at your table.

Whether you're unwinding by the pool or soaking in the lively island atmosphere, OUTRIGGER Waikīkī Paradise Hotel - formerly known as OHANA Waikiki East - is the perfect gateway to experiencing the best of both worlds.
location_description: OUTRIGGER Waikīkī Paradise Hotel (formerly OHANA Waikiki East)
offer_address: 150 Kaʻiulani Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96815, United States

Brought to you by the iconic Outrigger Hotels & Resorts, curated by local artists and reflecting Hawaii's unique natural landscapes and rich culture, Waikiki Beachcomber is an iconic destination set right on Kalakaua Avenue - Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment precinct. title: Grand Opening: Waikiki’s Newest Luxury Hotel from Halekulani
description:
Experience Waikiki’s newest luxury hotel, brought to you by the iconic Halekulani brand: Halepuna Waikiki by Halekulani - the island's most anticipated hotel opening. With an unbeatable location in the heart of it all, sleek and modern design and an infinity pool with sprawling vistas over Waikiki, this newly opened tropical oasis is the name on everyone’s lips.

Your Hawaiian escape includes daily buffet breakfast, USD$120 credit to be used at any of the resort’s restaurant and bars as well as select venues at the legendary Halekulani Hotel, a glass of wine or beer during your stay, weekly free-flow manager's wine reception with finger food, a premier passport with discounts at Ala Moana Shopping centre, no resort fees and all taxes included in your package.
offer_address: 2233 Helumoa Rd, Honolulu, HI 96815, United States

title: Hawaii Escape near Waikiki Beach & Kalākaua Avenue with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Set your clock to island time at this stylish Waikiki stay, just a short stroll from sun-soaked Waikiki Beach and the buzzing International Market Place. Backed by the trusted Hilton name, you’ll find standout service in prime position to explore Oʻahu’s most iconic neighbourhood.

Start each day with a hearty Americana breakfast at TR Fire Grill, or swing by Holoholo Cafe & Market for locally roasted coffee and light bites on the go. After a day of coastal adventures, settle in at Shaka’s, the poolside bar, with a Mai Tai in hand - the perfect perch to watch the sun slip into a glowing Hawaiian sunset.

Keep your routine going at the onsite fitness centre, or trade it in for a scenic coastal walk with ocean views. Just five minutes away, Kalākaua Avenue hums with energy - a vibrant stretch where global flavours, designer boutiques and Hawaiian culture come together beneath swaying palms.
offer_address: 2330 Kūhiō Ave., Honolulu, HI 96815, United States

title: Iconic Outrigger Break on Waikiki Beach - Kids Stay and Eat Free!
description: Say “Aloha!” to Hawaii with a blissful stay at the Outrigger Reef Waikiki Beach Resort. Located directly on the iconic Waikiki Beach, it’s a tropical, relaxing break for families and couples alike. Included in your getaway is daily buffet breakfast at The Reef Bar & Market Grill and a daily cocktail for two. Plus, the resort charge is included, giving you access to complimentary Wi-Fi, unlimited rides on the resort trolley, 60 minutes of local or international calls and more. Travelling with kids? The great news is that up to three children aged 12 and under stay and eat for free - completely exclusive to Luxury Escapes!

title: Hawaii Beachcomber by OUTRIGGER Escape Overlooking Waikiki Beach
description:
Steps from one of the world's most famous shorelines, you'll find Hawaii's first and only craft hotel, brought to you by the iconic OUTRIGGER Hotels & Resorts. Placing you just moments from Waikiki Beach and the palm-lined Kalakaua Avenue, Honolulu's best is right on your doorstep.

Curated by local artists and reflecting the island's natural landscapes and rich culture, the hotel's interiors feature surf photography and indigenous art that embody the laidback Hawaiian lifestyle.

You'll be spoiled with the luxe facilities onsite, including a glorious pool, sun-drenched deck and its very own OUTRIGGER Theater, showcasing acrobatics and soul-stirring music. Begin each day with artisanal coffee and Acai bowls at Hawaiian Aroma Caffé, which doubles as a cocktail bar, and sample one of the 35+ craft beers on tap at Maui Brewing Co. - Hawaii’s largest craft brewery.
offer_address: 2300 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HI 96815, United States

title: Tropical Hawaii Bliss near Waikiki Beach & Diamond Head with Onsite Dining
description:
Lotus Honolulu at Diamond Head is your go-to resort for a healthy dose of island bliss, nestled near the legendary Diamond Head Crater. The resort exudes an easygoing aura matched perfectly with the comforts of home. Think spacious rooms with expansive views, native greenery surroundings, and the beach mere moments away.

As for exploring, you're in the thick of everything. Kaimana Beach is quick stroll away for leisurely morning swims or afternoon relaxation sessions. Discover local favourites like poké bowls at Poke Waikiki, or loco moco at Rainbow Drive-In. Cultural spots like the Bishop Museum and Pearl Harbour are within a 40 minute drive of the resort, and provide a window into Hawaii's colourful history and dynamic culture.
offer_address: 2885 Kalakaua Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96815, United States
